mapper.select: select cal_no , emp_no , TO_CHAR(to_date(cal_start, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "cal_start" , TO_CHAR(to_date(cal_end, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "cal_end" , cal_content , cal_color from calendar where emp_no = 3 or emp_no = 1

select cal_no , emp_no , TO_CHAR(to_date(cal_start, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "cal_start" , TO_CHAR(to_date(cal_end, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "cal_end" , cal_content , cal_color from calendar where emp_no = 1
